Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. This item is truly a testament to quality and innovation, and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $150. This special opportunity allows you to experience the excellence of our product at a slightly elevated cost compared to our standard retail pricing, making it an even more appealing investment. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that exceeds expectations. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
